patchNotes.title: Talent rework
patchNotes.developerCommentary: Muradin does not need much changes, he is simples and mostly well designed. My plan here is just to polish some talents that are either too generic or underpicked

changes.name: NEW: Dwarf Survival Tactics

texts.text: Increase dwarf toss armor duration by 2 seconds
Decrease Second Wind activation time to 1.5 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: By enabling a fast use of Second Wind this could enhance Muradin potential for fast trades even more as he could take his bets on an engage and fastly go for another one.

changes.name: NEW: Empowered Storm Bolt

texts.text: Activate to empower the next Storm Bolt making it stuns and damage enemies on a small area around the target and at the maximum range
subtexts: Radius will be 3.0 | The same as thunder clap

changes.developerCommentary: Inspired by Sven Dota Stun. You can check it here https://www.dota2.com/hero/sven

changes.name: Imposing presence
changes.developerCommentary: I dislike the generic talents concept and i also see no reason for such talent due to Muradin thunderclap it just overlaps.

changes.name: Unstoppable Force

texts.text: Won't reduce dwarf toss cooldown anymore
While Avatar is active reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Muradin by 50%. Dwarf Toss grants unstoppable while leaping

changes.developerCommentary: For making the new Flying Dwarf talent

changes.name: Grand Slam

texts.text: Additional functionality: Casting Haymaker reset Dwarf Toss cooldown

changes.developerCommentary: I find extremely funny to punch jump. No more reasons

changes.name: Thunder Strike

texts.text: Activate to empower the next Thunderclap. Muradin will cast thunderclap three times under a period of 1.25 seconds increasing the thunderclap size by 50% and damage by 75% each time it's cast
subtexts: The first thunderclap will be normal
The second thunderclap will have extra 50% size and 75% more damage
The third thunderclap will have extra 100% size and 150% more damage
Final radius is 6.0 | Blaze combustion is 6.5
It interacts with all the thunder clap talents

changes.developerCommentary: I also taught on making it become somewhat similar do Earthshaker Echo Slam by increasing the damage by hero hit instead ot baseline extra damage but i think we shouls reserve that for new hero concept ideas.

changes.name: It's Hammer Time

texts.text: Storm Bolt now pierces all targets. Hitting an enemy with Storm Bolt increases Muradin attack speed by 40% for 4 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: For all my bruiseradins i got you.

changes.name: Hardened shield, Rewind
changes.developerCommentary: I really dislike talents that are made on the concept of being generic and also Hardened Shield serves the purpose of Avatar when you take Haymaker but that shouldn't be a possibility as you went for the damage route. As for rewind the talent is extremely toxic on tanks and i tell this being a tank main not a butthurt assassin.
